entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:02 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
